description:
Are you searching for your Dream Job or do you have a job that you would like to explore?

This course will navigate you through some incredible Canadian and U.S. career websites in order to find the answers to those questions.

It consists of:

  • 9 time-tested, dynamic, fun, creative, engaging, and insightful VIDEO TUTORIALS; approximately 90 minutes of information.
  • 5 inspirational & interactive exercises that will help you explore the Job of your Dreams.
  • Communication with other like-minded Dream Job Explorers on Udemy & Facebook.
  • E-mail support from David!
  • Discounts off private coaching sessions with David!
  • Discounts off future courses!

By the end of this course, you will have

  • watched several videos on your Dream Job,
  • explored a job profile of your Dream Job,
  • learned which skills you need for your Dream Job,
  • examined the Education & Training needed for your Dream Job,
  • researched how to receive the financial resources you need in order to make your Dream Job happen,
  • found the employers hiring for your Dream Job,
  • learned where to take further training & coaching to help you Discover & Explore your Dream Job,
  • and complete several exercises to determine whether or not you have found your Dream Job
title: 6 Best Career Websites To Discover Your Dream Job
